about_the_game:
Are you ready to experience the life of a space station dive bar? Introducing 'Bounty Hunter' - the revolutionary bounty huntin’ card game that defies all expectations! Get ready to embark on an exhilarating journey as you take on the role of a mysterious bounty hunter Tane who must earn their stripes in the dangerous outlaw world.



With thrilling heists and exciting missions, 'Bounty Hunter' is the game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Meet fascinating characters, both friend and foe, as you navigate your way up a syndicate ladder and complete card-crawling missions filled with secrets and dangerous creatures.

'Bounty Hunter' is a game that will challenge your skills and strategy to the limit. So what are you waiting for? Join the action-packed adventure of 'Bounty Hunter' and become the ultimate outlaw legend today!



‘Bounty Hunter’ expands on a classic 3x3 grid card crawler formula by adding multiple new mechanics that will get your brain go to overdrive. Progress through secured corridors, sneak up on a variety of enemies, find your bounty and escape with your spoils. Replay missions to get new high scores, get space bucks and upgrade your gear for the next mission. Play a variety of different mission types (not available in the demo) and become the top-paying bounty hunter.


Bounty Hunter Story



After waking up with no memory, a bounty hunter named Tane finds himself at the bottom ranks of a criminal guild. Here he meets a dirty cop named McMerdoc and discovers that the Guild Master may be responsible for his memory loss. Will Tane and McMerdoc have what it takes to take down the Guild Master? Or is the Guild Master really at fault here? Rise through the ranks, complete bounty hunter missions, upgrade your gear and discover the truth about your past.


Guns, Gear & Boosters



Use a variety of different weapons suited for different situations, dispatch enemies using military-grade teleporters or sneak around them and never get seen! Gameplay is further expanded with Boosters - passive items that change the gameplay to suit your playstyle.

Features:

  • 3x3 Card Grid Gameplay
  • Interesting space station dive bar with unique characters
  • Mix of 2D and 3D
  • Various mission types (limited in demo)
  • a story filled with intrigue (limited in demo)
  • Gun upgrades
  • Large selection of gear (active items)

name: Bounty Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: "Bounty Hunter" is a card-based dungeon crawler. Navigate through puzzle decks with enemies, traps and puzzles using guns, items and upgrades bought at a dive bar game hub that’s a front for a crime syndicate. Meet fascinating characters and experience the story.
